name: Granite Ventures
overview:
Granite Ventures has been helping early-stage technology companies build solid foundations for success since 1992. They focus their investments on two sectors where their partners have deep domain expertise, broad industry knowledge, and significant investment experience: Communications and Components and Software.

Granite has managed over $1 billion in venture capital and has invested in more than 90 private companies. They partner with promising and successful entrepreneurs to create businesses that have a competitive edge and help them achieve category leadership.

milestones.description: Eric Gries and William â€œBillâ€ J. Miller have joined Granite Ventures
milestones.source_text:
SAN FRANCISCO (July 16, 2008) â€“ Granite Ventures, LLC, today announced that Eric Gries and William â€œBillâ€ J. Miller have joined the firm. Gries, who has more than two decades of experience in executive leadership and building high-growth technology businesses, will serve as Granite Venturesâ€™ executive in residence (EIR). Miller, who will serve as a strategic advisor to Granite Ventures, has been an independent director and consultant to numerous technology companies since 1999.

 

â€œGranite Ventures prides itself on collectively broad and individually deep domain expertise, hands-on experience growing successful businesses and broad networks of contacts to support every stage of our portfolio companiesâ€™ expansion,â€ said Standish Oâ€™Grady, managing director at Granite Ventures. â€œEricâ€™s deep operational experience in software and communications technology paired with the strategic vision Bill has achieved working across a broad array of technology companies on core management and business strategy underscore the collective value and expertise we bring to our portfolio. We are pleased to introduce Eric and Bill to our team, further strengthening Granite Venturesâ€™ intellectual capital.â€

 

As EIR, Gries will advise Granite Venturesâ€™ portfolio companies on a variety of operational issues, with a focus on software and communications. During his career, Gries has served as CEO, general manager and vice president for companies in networking, application development, systems management, financial services and hardware systems, in both the U.S. and Europe. Prior to joining Granite Ventures, he built and led XACCT, a pioneering network mediation market leader, as its president and CEO. XACCT was acquired by Amdocs in 2004, at which time Eric joined Amdocsâ€™ executive team as senior vice president. Earlier in his career, Eric served as general manager of Compuwareâ€™s Network and Systems Management division, and held product management, marketing, sales and engineering positions at companies such as ACI, Cullinet Software and DEC.

 

As a strategic advisor, Miller will advise Granite Ventures on management and business strategy issues. Miller currently serves on the boards of directors at a number of companies, including NVIDIA Corp., where he has been a director since 1994; Digimarc Corp.; Glu Mobile Inc.; Overland Storage Inc. and Waters Corp. Before beginning his consulting career, Miller served as chairman, president and CEO at Avid Technology Inc. He held the positions of chairman, CEO and director at Quantum Corp, and served in a number of positions at Control Data Corp. (CDC), including executive vice president and president of Information Services. He was president of Imprimis, the data storage subsidiary of CDC.

 

About Granite Ventures, LLC


Granite Ventures has been helping early-stage technology companies build solid foundations for success since 1992. Granite has managed over $1 billion in venture capital and has invested in more than 100 private companies. They partner with promising and successful entrepreneurs to create businesses that have a competitive edge, and help those businesses achieve category leadership. More information can be found at www.granitevc.com.
